translation: Therefore, let the scripture be thy authority in determining what ought to be done and what ought not to be done. Having known what is said in the ordinance of the scriptures, thou shouldst act in this world.
commentary: 16.24 Therefore therefore? scripture scripture? proof (be) authority? And they? Karyakaryavyavasthitau in determining what ought to be done and what ought not to be done? knowing having known? What is said in the ordinance of the scriptures? Karma action? to do to do? Ih here (in this world)? You deserve shouldst.Commentary He who desires the welfare of the Self should not disregard
